p: The included studies gathered a range of experiences and needs of pregnant women, midwives, and nurses from maternity units during epidemics and pandemics that occurred in the last 20 years. From the thematic synthesis, four themes were identified: (1) psychological responses, (2) challenges faced, (3) coping strategies, and (4) sources of support and support needs. These themes are elaborated and supported with the participantsâ€™ quotes from the included studies.
